title: Detective Conan - 780 (NTV 1280x720 x264 AAC).mp4
description: [Kudou Shin`ichi] is a famous 17-year-old high school detective who helps the police solve cases. While investigating a mysterious organization, he was knocked unconscious by one of them, and an experimental poison was forced down his throat. Instead of killing him, however, the drug shrunk him into a little kid. In order to prevent the men in black who did this to him from hurting his friends and family, he changed his name to [Edogawa Conan] and took on the identity of a gifted primary school student who solves mysteries and crimes through reasoning, logic, the help of his friends and some nifty gadgets Dr. [Agasa Hiroshi] invented for him. Now, he lives with his childhood friend, [Mouri Ran], and her father, detective [Mouri Kogorou], without them knowing about his situation, and carries on his investigation of the organization that is still out to kill him
